name: Meme vs Rage 2
description:
The angry animals try to protect the forest from illegal logging of the memes.
This is a tower defense game - This is a war without end.
Super funny memes. Excellent gameplay, graphic and animation.

Features:  
• 32 awesome animals with special and super skills. 
• 13 different enemies that guys from rage comics: Serious Guy, Sad Guy, Like a boss, Mr.Okey, Troll face, Forever alone , LOL rage, …
• 48 great maps with 4 campaigns and a big survival endless map

You need a good plan, wise strategy and fast hands to protect the forest from the memes !!! 
If you are a big fan of tower defense and meme rage comic, this game is for you.
Enjoy it !
